text: . wer the following four questions: Sender Receiver First bit of first packet g— g transmitted, tw 0 —— e — - - ———mmmm e m e RYT 2 Sliding Window Protocol Parameters: L = frame size in bits = 1Kb R =link rate in bits/second = 1Mbps RTT = Round Trip Time in seconds, = 20 msec W = Window Size Assume that the sender is transferring a large file of size 100Kb and window size is 20. what throughput (kb/s) sender can achieve in transmitting to receiver(and also acknowledged by receiver) using sliding window protocol?
